title: Thibau Nys Confirms Status as Cycling’s Next Multi-Discipline Megastar with Bronze at CX Worlds
content:
Nys proves he belongs among CX royalty with worlds podium: 'Being on the podium with Mathieu and Wout is a dream come true.'

Read the full article at Thibau Nys Confirms Status as Cycling’s Next Multi-Discipline Megastar with Bronze at CX Worlds on Velo.
author: sstokes
